subject: Horse Racing
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
Kentucky Derby
lead_paragraph: Three accomplished but flawed colts will most likely be the betting favorites for the 135th running of the Kentucky Derby. So what’s a horseplayer to do for three weeks?
